name: Diva - The Finest Girl
description:
Diva - The Finest Girl is a platformer game based on a short story of a girl and her mother.

This game was made for the Game Boy Competition 2021. It could be played on Web, Game Boy Emulator and Game Boy System. The projects files are also downloadable! The project is made using GB Studio 2 beta5. Anybody can download, modify and reuse the project file.

Controls ActionKeyboardGame BoyMoveArrow KeysD-PadStart/PauseEnterStartInteractZAJumpXBEnter HouseUP ArrowD-Pad UP Special Thanks
  • GB Studio Team (https://www.gbstudio.dev/)
  • Pixel Pete (Great Youtube Tutorial)
  • Robert Doman (Great Youtube Tutorial)
Assets Used
  • GB Studio Default Assets
  • Pixel Pete Assets

Github Repo:

  • https://github.com/sajjad-ctg/Diva-The-Finest-Girl-GB-Studio-Project
